coreAttributes.name: Arm Cannon
coreAttributes.description: An Arm Cannon capable of firing different kinds of projectiles, although some components are missing. Thankfully you wont have to look for those, you have the Arcane!
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(draw)] [npc.her] Arm Cannon, ready to use it in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Aiming and firing [npc.her] Arm Cannon, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.name] with a powerful arcane projectile!
Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Arm Cannon, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, unleashing a powerful blast of arcane energy that slams into [npc2.namePos] torso!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Arm Cannon, and, pulling the trigger, [npc.she] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Arm Cannon, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, letting out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Arm Cannon and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc.her] target!
